home_job: I am a Full stack web developer, and freelance web designer.
about_desc: Hello, my name is Adeoye Adeagbo and I love doing stuff for the internet especially open-source projects. My interest for web development started at a very young age but I did not explore that until I became of age due to life having other plans for me: I decided to go back to school and get the adequate education required to upgrade my skill set. I mainly develop the front-end side of things and am open to new opportunities.
experience_0_overview: Concentrix is a company that helps create CX games to create experiences that customers actually appreciate and keep coming back for.
experience_1_overview: Ribex Global Services LTD is a health & Safety Services that also contracts with various government agencies.
experience_2_overview: Smartflow Technologies ltd provides oil and gas players/consumers the much needed Business intelligence to inform more data-driven business solutions.
projects_1_overview: SMS is a school management system.
projects_2_overview: Weather hub is a hub for knowing the current local city weather around the globe.
projects_3_overview: Quadratic Calculator is an online calculator solution for students and instructors.
projects_1_extended_overview: SMS is a school management system: it allows students and instructors to register for their desired courses or classes they will be teaching respectively.
projects_2_extended_overview: Weather hub is a hub for knowing the current local city weather around the globe.
projects_3_extended_overview: Quadratic Calculator is an online calculator solution for students and instructors: This efficient calculator allows students as well as instructors to calculate complex equations online without the need for the common hardware calculators.
